content:
Hey @nikomatsakis @Josh Triplett -- for this week's planning meeting, I sent out asks for status updates last week to all (definitely most, may have missed someone) of the groups.

Ready updates:

  • const-evaluation - https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/22#issuecomment-873364101
  • safe transmute - https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/21#issuecomment-870514068
  • macro metavariable - https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/83527#issuecomment-870392547
  • never type - 2 updates (from a week ago and today) - https://github.com/rust-lang/lang-team/issues/60#issuecomment-870126162
  • deny trailing semicolons - https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/213817-t-lang/topic/deny.20trailing.20semicolons.20project.20update/near/244316033
  • instruction set - https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/213817-t-lang/topic/instruction_set.20status.20report/near/244224622

No updates yet:

  • async-foundations - no update yet, asked again just now ( #wg-async-foundations > lang team planning update )
  • const-generics - no update yet, asked again just now ( #project-const-generics > lang team planning meeting update )
  • deref patterns - no update yet, asked again just now. as noted in the Zulip topic, some of the questions from the last update haven't been fully communicated back/answered yet #project-deref-patterns > planning meeting update
  • let else - no update yet (not sure where to ask for one. in any case not really a project group...)
  • rfc 2229 - no update quite yet, asked again just now (#t-compiler/wg-rfc-2229 > lang project update)
  • ffi unwind - no update yet. seems like no blocking issues right now based on discussion on the thread - #project-ffi-unwind > lang team update
  • project inline asm - no update yet, have re-asked in #project-inline-asm > planning meeting status update
Hopefully that's helpful for creating the agenda, I likely won't have too much time to follow up any more on this.

upcasting: mcp still in fcp, implementation status:
https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/144729-wg-traits/topic/object.20upcasting/near/244513865
